creator: prashiman@indiatimes.com
text:
Sir/Madam
         I have loaded the tomcat in my PC and set the variables accoring to 
the README.TXT file still my tomcat is not working if i type http://localhost
i will get unauthorised.And few lines of Unauthoried messages like 401 error.

If i give http://localhost/one.jsp, this is the file i have created and stord 
correctly in webapps/root.I will get a long list of messages and says internal 
error 501 what do i do to run tomcat correctly.
Please help me

creator: funkman@joedog.org
text: Please use the tomcat-user list to debug this issue.
